name: Copalette
description:
Copalette is for generating color palettes based on primary colors


Usage

  1. choose the color you want
  2. Name your color
  3. Set the number of colors you want to generate from the main color
  4. Set your circle if you want (optional) suggested default settings
  5. Set circle spacing if you want (optional) suggested default setting
  6. The last step choose horizontal or vertical orientation
  7. Then press the generate button


Enjoy!
